summary.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A具有隱含內容親和性。A has implied context affinity. 如果程序嘗試存取擁有的內容不同的內容從，擲回例外狀況。If a procedure attempts to access the from a different context than the context of the owning , an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並新增成員到它。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入其實`null`且不會引發例外狀況。Adding a whose value is `null` is permitted and does not raise an exception. 方法也會設定父系-子系之間的關聯性的父 visual，也就是擁有者的，與子系`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更低層級控制的自訂類別的視覺化子物件的基礎儲存體實作，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects of a custom class, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，您必須定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you must define your own storage implementation, and do not use . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並新增成員到它。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是實際的項目數目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 是的項目數，存放。 is the number of elements that the is capable of storing. 一定會小於或等於。 is always less than or equal to . 如果超過時加入項目，清單的容量加倍複製舊的項目並加入新項目之前，自動重新配置內部的陣列。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於、 容量的增加新插入。If already equals , the capacity of the is increased before the new is inserted. 如果`index`等於，`visual`加入至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `visual` is added to the end of . 任何現有的視覺效果的物件，等於或大於`index`移位，以容納新，而且會更新其索引值。Any existing visual objects that are equal to or greater than `index` are shifted to accommodate the new , and their index values are updated. 方法也會設定父系-子系之間的關聯性的父 visual，也就是擁有者的，與子系`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更廣泛的低階控制視覺子物件的基礎儲存體實作，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，可定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請遵循移除的物件的 visual 物件移位，以佔用空出的位置，並會更新其索引值。The visual objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated. 如果`visual`是`null`，第一個`null`項目已移除。If `visual` is `null`, the first `null` entry is removed. 請注意該移除`null`項目中是線性集合的大小。Note that removing a `null` entry is linear in the size of the collection. 方法也會移除父系-子系之間的關聯性的父 visual，也就是擁有者的，與子系`visual`。The method also removes the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更廣泛的低階控制視覺子物件的基礎儲存體實作，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，可定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .
